util

Class Coordinate

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.Coordinate

  • public class Coordinate
extends java.lang.Object
    Coordinate2D represents a point in 2D space, has an x-coordinate and y-coordinate (0,0) by convention is the most left upper square.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Coordinate(int x, int y)
      Initialize a new coordinate with a given x- and y-coordinates

      Returns a new Coordinate in the given Direction at the given Distance.

      Returns the closest neighboring coordinate in the given direction

        public boolean equals(@Nullable
